definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)

sentences.english: Who could have predicted that within ten years hed be in charge of the whole company?
sentences.chinese: 誰曾能預料到在十年內他會成爲整個公司的負責人？

sentences.english: You may bank in directly to our bank account. Once you have banked in, please inform us.
sentences.chinese: 您可直接將捐款進入禪院戶口，並通知禪院負責人。

sentences.english: Department heads review the reviews, re-grade and re-rank.
sentences.chinese: 部門負責人會審查評估結果，重新打分和排名。

sentences.english: The heads of some of China's most vital state-owned companies, including oil giant CNOOC, also studied abroad.
sentences.chinese: 中國一些最重要的國有企業的負責人也曾在海外學習。

sentences.english: Zhang Shuqin, Director, Beijing Sun Village Consultancy for Children Education.
sentences.chinese: 北京太陽村兒童教育諮詢部負責人張淑琴。

sentences.english: We should accept it with seriousness and a sense of responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該嚴肅認真負責人的接受它。

sentences.english: That’s why Beijing high school principals concern themselves primarily with student recruitment and admission.
sentences.chinese: 因此，北京中學負責人最關心的事就是招生和入學。

sentences.english: They refer more serious problems to the manager or the appropriate department head.
sentences.chinese: 他們向經理或相關部門負責人指出更嚴重的問題。

sentences.english: Personal seals of the persons in charge should also be protected as official seals.
sentences.chinese: 負責人的私章有時也需要和公章同樣保護。

sentences.english: Shenhu town in charge of Enterprise Office official said.
sentences.chinese: 深滬鎮分管企業辦負責人表示。
鄭州機場公司相關負責人說。

sentences.english: Design heads reported directly to the president of each business unit.
sentences.chinese: 設計負責人直接向每個業務部門的總裁彙報工作。

sentences.english: Dr Steve Rintoul, the voyage leader, says the survey has revealed changes in the ocean around Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 航行負責人史帝夫說，考察顯示出南極海域的改變。

sentences.english: The Team Leader will provide leadership to and coordinate all activities of the CPT.
sentences.chinese: 該小組負責人將負責領導和協調彩管的所有活動。

sentences.english: This regulation will be enacted after signature by the person with authorities of both parties.
sentences.chinese: 第十五條本規程由雙方協商一致，負責人簽字後生效。

sentences.english: As the principle, I'm in responsibility of it.
sentences.chinese: 作爲華科負責人是有責任的。

definition: head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
